Passaic.WINS (AM):
WINS (1010 kHz), known on-air as "10-10 Wins", is a radio station licensed to New York City and is owned by Entercom. WINS' studios are in the Hudson Square neighborhood of Manhattan, and its transmitting facility is located in Lyndhurst, New Jersey.
WINS is the oldest all-news radio station in the United States, broadcasting in that format continuously since 1965.
